channel.title: molecular dynamics on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in molecular dynamics on Memo Tut

item.title: [Python] Molecular dynamics simulation to try for the time being
item.description: In this article, I'll briefly explain about molecular dynamics and try a simple simulation. For the simulation, we will use a Python module called [Atomic Simulation Environment](https://wiki.fysik.dtu.dk/ase/index.html). What is molecular dynamics? Molecular Dynamics (MD) obtains dynamic processes of atoms and molecules by solving equations of motion based on interactions (potentials) between atoms and molecules. What we see around us is an aggregate of atoms and molecules, if we look at it in detail.
